#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int a[21];
unsigned long long int f[21];

int main()
{
    f[0]=1;
    for(int i =1; i <= 20;i++)
        f[i]=f[i-1]*i;
    for(int i=1; i <= 20;i++)
    {
        a[i]=0;
        for(int j=2;j <= i;j+=2 )
            a[i]+=(f[i])/(f[j]);
        for(int j =3; j <= i;j+=2)
            a[i]-=(f[i])/(f[j]);
    }
    int test;
    cin>>test;
    for(int i =1;i <= test;i++)
    {
        int v;
        scanf("%d",&v);
        cout<<a[v]<<endl;
    }
}
